statements: DELETE FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1 AND backup_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM backups WHERE backup_path LIKE '%archive%' AND backup_name = 'daily_backup';
DELETE FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 AND backup_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM backup_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-03-15' AND backup_id IN (SELECT id FROM backups WHERE backup_name LIKE 'daily%');
DELETE FROM backup_locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM backup_locations WHERE location_name = 'Main');
